alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:46PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Owyhee and east central Malheur Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 546 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Antelope Reservoir, or 23 miles northeast of Rome, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jordan Valley around 550 PM MDT. Sheaville around 620 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
